channel.title: How to add drink option?
channel.description: Well, i want to add a drink option to something. How can i do that? And another question. If this is possible, and i did it, how can i do that if u drink it like your defence level goes from 50/50 to 99/50 and that it goes down again to 50 like if u drink an strength potion at runescape.

item.title: How to add drink option?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

idk about changing the name in the command line, probably something to do with your client, idk though
how everâ€¦
open potions.java and add this:

			case XXXX:
				if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
				return;
				c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();	
				c.playerLevel[1] = 99;
				c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[1] + "", 4008);
				c.deleteItem(XXXX, slot, 1);
				break;
